channel.title: Raiding
channel.description: Alright guys. I get that raiding is allowed and everything, but does everyone seriously have to raid my castle AND my town? It's really ruining the place. I put a lot of hard work into these places. But I can see that manners don't mean anything, anymore, to anyone on this server. :( v.v' I get that now, I'll probably be one of the most targeted people, and that now, I'm probably going to have to tear down all my hard work, and slowly move to a new location. But if anyone here still cares, thank you. :/

item.title: Raiding
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:50, topic:409384”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=510668.msg3728188#msg3728188 date=1314446042]

We could bring back lwc with unlimited locks, no fire damage and no lava. I remember on the first server (very first), I think it was tabby’s house that got burned, so it’d still like that off. Just no spread, netherrack and portals should work though. And if u want people together, we could limit the map size.

I remember it was lin’s house. First view I had of minecraft was funny and I still remember the days of looking for dirt to be able to survive the night. I remember first day ever when I went on and was cutting corey’s trees and he got mad at me
[/quote]

Well someone did burn all of the trees in the area, haha.[/quote]
And I tried finding shelter by standing on Tom’s house and he got mad, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Raiding
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:27, topic:409384”]Yeah, most players just build then grief the server and leave. Hell, there is a lot of things I would suggest changing but like this they just get ignored. I think everyone has realized that by now.

moparcraft riots 2011!

Come to think of things, what happened to the theme changing! As much as I like this theme I think a minecraft themed theme would be a good option that we could choose. I know you’ve said in the past if we want it then you’ll add it, and there was a poll, but you never did anything![/quote]

theres alot that hasnt been done

Read full topic
